title: Muppets Haunted Mansion | Official Trailer | Disney+
author: Disney Plus
description:
Prepare to scream… and stream! #MuppetsHauntedMansion, an Original Special, makes its spook-tacular entrance October 8 on #DisneyPlus. #Hallowstream

For more updates, subscribe to Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic.
 
Disney+ is the ultimate streaming destination for entertainment from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic.
